name: FLAPPY BIT
description:
Use the Flappy Bit game to help you get the most out of your time. You ask yourself if this is not just a cheap clone of a successful game? No actually it is even less ... I mean look at this graphic. The game consists only of whites and black pixels ...

But if you play it then it makes you somehow addicted. So try it out and download it now free ... You can also uninstall it if you are still not convinced :D
